vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.27;
son of: Jeroham (H3395H);
brother of: Shamsherai (H8125), Shehariah (H7841), Athaliah (H6271H), Elijah (H0452H) and Zichri (H2147J)
§ Jaresiah = "whom Jehovah nourishes"
a Benjamite, one of the descendants of Jehoram
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jeroham; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅利西 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華所撫育的"
便雅憫人耶羅罕的一位後裔 (代上 8:27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅利西 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华所抚育的"
便雅悯人耶罗罕的一位后裔 (代上 8:27)
